title: Cluster
description: A character in a Role Playing Game.

type.description: The type of thingy the data describes, 'character'.

schemaVersion.description: The version of the schema for the data.

refresh.description: The current minimum number of Fate points the player of this character starts with at the beginning of a session.

fatePoints.description: The current number of Fate points the player of this character currently has.

description.description: A description of the Aspect, giving a little more context.

traitType.description: The type of the properties of the character used as a bonus on a dice roll to resolve actions.

name.description: The name of the trait, like 'Notice', 'Careful', or 'Warrior'

rank.description: The bonus applied to a resolution roll when this trait is applicable.

description.description: A description of the stunt describe the mechanical or narrative effect of the stunt and the conditions under which it applies.

parameters.description: The details of the mechanical effect of a stunt.

trait.description: The trait (from the 'trait[].name' list) that the mechanics of this stunt applies.

modifier.description: How many points should be applied as the mechanical effect of the stunt. It can either add to a roll or the shifts of effect from the roll when successful.

actions.description: The action types to which the mechanical effect applies.

modificationType.description: The part of the resolution task to which the modifier is applied, either the total of the roll, or the total of the effect when the roll is successful.
